import { Component, OnInit, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { Contact } from '../contact.model'; @Component({ selector: 'cms-contact-detail', templateUrl: './contact-detail.component.html', styleUrls: ['./contact-detail.component.css'], }) export class ContactDetailComponent implements OnInit { @Input() contact: Contact; constructor() {} ngOnInit() {} name = 'Brother Wilson'; }
